thread.title: President Obama addresses sentencing reform, lack of policing data and the Black Lives Matter movement
thread.title_full: President Obama addresses sentencing reform, lack of policing data and the Black Lives Matter movement - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: President Obama addresses sentencing reform, lack of policing data and the Black Lives Matter movement
text: With Congress considering legislation that would be its first major criminal justice reform measures in a decade, President Obama launched what will be a multi-state speaking tour in support of broad criminal justice reform Thursday, calling for changes to make criminal sentencing, prisons and policing more fair. "We're in a unique moment in which on a [â€¦] ...
